page.title: 17Government
page.content: The{Yaxley}Parish Council plays a very important part in the life of the village. The members are elected every four years.Full councill meetings are held every month with different comittee meetings as necessary.The public are welcome but most remain silent.All the local by_laws are made by the Parish Councill.If a member of the wishes to bring a point to the attention of the councill,they must do so in writing to the clerk of the council. The Council is also responsible for playing fields and other land facilities in {Yaxley}e.g. there are 100 allotments all of which are in use with a long waiting list as well.They are also responsible for burials.
